Name: LU 181 - Planning, Melrose Commons North, Bronx (C 150152 ZMX)
Title: Resolution approving the decision of the City Planning Commission on ULURP No. C 150152  ZMX, a Zoning Map amendment (L.U. No. 181).

History.Description: This Resolution was Approved by Committee
A motion was made that this Resolution be Approved, by Council approved by consent Roll Call.

Attachments.Name: March 11, 2015 - Stated Meeting Agenda with Links to Files
Minutes of the Stated Meeting - March 11, 2015

RTF:
{\rtf1\fbidis\ansi\ansicpg1252\deff0\deflang1033\deflangfe1033{\fonttbl{\f0\froman\fprq2\fcharset0 Times New Roman;}}

\viewkind4\uc1
\v0\par
By Council Members Greenfield and Dickens\par
\par
\tab WHEREAS, the City Planning Commission filed with the Council on February 20, 2015 its decision dated February 18, 2015 (the "Decision"), on the application submitted by the New York City Department of Housing Preservation and Development, pursuant to Sections 197-c and 201 of the New York City Charter, for an amendment of the Zoning Map, Section Nos. 6a and 6c, to rezone the northern portion of the block bounded by 162nd Street in the south, Melrose Avenue to the east, 163rd Street to the north and Courtlandt Avenue to the west (Block 2408) from an R7-2 Zoning District to R7-2/C1-4 and R8/C1-4 districts, in Community District 3 of the Bronx, which in conjunction with the related actions would facilitate the construction of a mixed-use development containing affordable and supportive housing, within the Melrose Commons Urban Renewal Area, in Community District 3\cf1  \cf0 (ULURP No. C 150152 ZMX), \expndtw-4 Borough of the Bronx \expndtw0 (the "Application");\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, the application is related to Applications C 150153 HUX (L.U. No. 180), the third amendment to the Melrose Commons Urban Renewal Plan; C 150154 HAX (L.U. No. 182), an urban development action area project designation, project approval and disposition of city-owned properties to developers to be selected by the Department of Housing Preservation and Development; and C 120323 MMX (L.U. No. 183), amendments to the City Map;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, the Decision is subject to review and action by the Council pursuant to Section 197-d(b)(1) of the City Charter;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, upon due notice, the Council held a public hearing on the Decision and Application on March 9, 2015;\par
\par
WHEREAS, the Council has considered the land use implications and other policy issues relating to the Decision and Application; and\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\tab WHEREAS, the Council has considered the relevant environmental issues, including the negative declaration (CEQR No. 14HPD030X) issued on October 9, 2014 (the \ldblquote Negative Declaration\rdblquote );\par
\par
\par
\par
RESOLVED:\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx0\tx720\tx1260\tx1440\tx1620\tab The Council finds that the action described herein will have no significant impact on the environment as set forth in the Negative Declaration.\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tab Pursuant to Section 197-d and 200 of the City Charter and on the basis of the Decision and Application, and based on the environmental determination and consideration described in the report, C 150152 ZMX, incorporated by reference herein, the Council approves the Decision.\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj\par
The Zoning Resolution of the City of New York, effective as of December 15, 1961, and as subsequently amended, is further amended by changing the Zoning Map,\cf1\expndtw-6  \cf0\expndtw0 Section Nos. 6a and 6c:\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-720\li720\qj 1.\tab changing from an R7-2 District to an R8 District on property bounded by the centerline of the former Melrose Crescent, a line 100 feet northeasterly of East 161\super\up7 st\nosupersub  \up0 Street, a line 320 feet southeasterly of Melrose Avenue, East 162\super\up7 nd\nosupersub  \up0 Street, and a line 270 feet southeasterly of Melrose Avenue; \par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\li720\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-720\li720\qj 2.\tab establishing within an existing R7-2 District a C1-4 District bounded by East 163\super\up7 rd\nosupersub  \up0 Street, a line 270 feet southeasterly of Melrose Avenue, a line midway between East 163\super\up7 rd\nosupersub  \up0 Street and East 162\super\up7 nd\nosupersub  \up0 Street, and Melrose Avenue; and\par
\pard\ltrpar\li720\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-720\li720\qj 3.\tab establishing within existing and proposed R8 Districts a C1-4 District bounded by:\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-720\li1440\qj a.\tab East 163\super\up7 rd\nosupersub  \up0 Street,  the southwesterly boundary line of a Park and its northwesterly and southeasterly prolongations, Washington Avenue, Elton Avenue, a line 160 feet southwesterly of East 163\up7 rd\up0  Street, and a line 270 feet southeasterly of Melrose Avenue; and\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\li1080\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-720\li1440\qj b.\tab East 162\super\up7 nd\nosupersub  \up0 Street, Elton Avenue, the centerline of the former Melrose Crescent, a line 100 feet northeasterly of East 161\super\up7 st\nosupersub  \up0 Street, and a line 320 feet southeasterly of Melrose Avenue; \par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-720\li720\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj as shown on a diagram (for illustrative purposes only), dated November 17, 2014, Community District 3, Borough of the Bronx.\cf1\par
\cf0\page Adopted.\par
\par
  \tab Office of the City Clerk, \}\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj The City of New York,  \} ss.:\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi1440\qj I hereby certify that the foregoing is a true copy of a Resolution passed by The Council of The City of New York on March 11, 2015, on file in this office.\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\par
